summary: Iteration 6 testing for La Pulpería app - All 4 requested features verified: 1) Logo has FLAT roof (Art Deco stepped design using rect elements, not triangular polygon), 2) 'Comenzar con Google' button is visible and functional, 3) DELETE /api/pulperias/{id}/close endpoint exists and requires authentication, 4) BadgeDemo page removed from App.js routes. All 17 backend tests passed. Frontend UI verified via Playwright.
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ Logo (LandingPage.js lines 111-210): Uses rect elements for stepped flat roof (Art Deco style), not triangular polygon. Found 17+ rect elements in SVG.
✅ Google Login Button (LandingPage.js lines 376-399): 'Comenzar con Google' button with data-testid='login-button' is visible and functional

✅ Close Store Endpoint (server.py lines 857-900): DELETE /api/pulperias/{id}/close properly implemented with: 1) Authentication required, 2) Owner verification, 3) Confirmation phrase validation, 4) Deletes all related data (products, orders, reviews, achievements, announcements, jobs, featured_ads, featured_ad_slots, pulperias)
✅ Close Store Dialog (PulperiaDashboard.js lines 1820-1895): Confirmation dialog with input for pulperia name, proper validation, and redirect to /map after closing
✅ BadgeDemo Removed (App.js): No BadgeDemo import or /badge-demo route in App.js - page completely removed
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 4 requested features verified: 1) Logo now has flat Art Deco stepped roof using rect elements (lines 134-138 in LandingPage.js), 2) Google login button 'Comenzar con Google' is visible with data-testid='login-button', 3) Close store endpoint DELETE /api/pulperias/{id}/close requires auth and confirmation phrase matching pulperia name, 4) BadgeDemo completely removed from App.js. The close store feature includes: frontend dialog in PulperiaDashboard.js (lines 1820-1895), backend endpoint in server.py (lines 857-900), and proper cleanup of all related collections. Google OAuth for custom domain (lapulperiastore.net) is configured.
